body_html: It's an easy fix though. We need to add a formula for threshold to torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp, mark it as a fusable op in torch/csrc/jit/passes/graph_fuser.cpp, and add code that's equivalent to it in torch/csrc/jit/fusion_compiler.cpp (although this last part might cause conflicts with #10981).
body_text: It's an easy fix though. We need to add a formula for threshold to torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp, mark it as a fusable op in torch/csrc/jit/passes/graph_fuser.cpp, and add code that's equivalent to it in torch/csrc/jit/fusion_compiler.cpp (although this last part might cause conflicts with #10981).
body: It's an easy fix though. We need to add a formula for `threshold` to `torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp`, mark it as a fusable op in `torch/csrc/jit/passes/graph_fuser.cpp`, and add code that's equivalent to it in `torch/csrc/jit/fusion_compiler.cpp` (although this last part might cause conflicts with #10981).
